issue.title: [C++] Do not build C++ command line utilities by default
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-6636](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6636). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
This means to change `ARROW_BUILD_UTILITIES` to be off by default. These are mostly used for integration testing, so building unit or integration tests should toggle this on automatically.
